channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Space DOTS raises $1.5M seed round to provide insights on orbital threats
item.description: Cefalo is the founder of Space DOTs, which launched in 2022 to detect space threats. She and her team have created a software platform for space tech ...

item.title: The iPhone 17 Air Could Use a Silicon-Carbon Battery. What Is It?
item.description: Phones with thinner designs are enjoying a moment. But while thin phones usually suffer poor battery life, batteries with silicon-carbon anodes are he...

item.title: I Hate My AI Friend
item.description: The chatbot-enabled Friend necklace eavesdrops on your life and provides a running commentary that’s snarky and unhelpful. Worse, it can also make the...

item.title: Why Your Office Chair Should Have Lumbar Support
item.description: Office chairs and gaming chairs often tout lumbar support as a must-have feature. I spoke to some experts to see if it’s as essential as claimed.

item.title: Pinecone founder Edo Liberty discusses why the next big AI breakthrough starts with search, at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: At TechCrunch Disrupt 2025, Pinecone founder and CEO Edo Liberty will explain why the next wave of AI-native apps won’t be driven by bigger models, bu...

item.title: Nuclear startup Deep Fission goes public in a curious SPAC
item.description: Deep Fission had been seeking to raise $15 million in a seed round as recently as April. The reverse merger will raise twice that amount.

item.title: Save $60 on the DJI Mic Mini Kit—Price Drops to Just $109 Today
item.description: Show off your social side with this kit from DJI, which includes two microphones and a charging case. Our reviewers love it.

item.title: Bluesky adds private bookmarks
item.description: Bluesky adds bookmarks so users can privately save posts they want to reference later.

item.title: Flexport’s Ryan Petersen on building through chaos at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: Ryan Petersen, CEO of Flexport, joins the Builders Stage at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025, happening October 27–29 at Moscone West in San Francisco. Registe...

item.title: Why Former NFL All-Pros Are Turning to Psychedelics
item.description: Research into whether drugs like ayahuasca can mitigate the effects of traumatic brain injury is in its infancy. Pro athletes like Jordan Poyer are fo...
